structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Construction materials on premises before permit issued; removal of materials.

text.section:
Sec. 19-11. Construction materials on premises before permit issued; removal of materials.
Construction materials and equipment shall not be deposited on any lot in any zoning district prior to the obtaining of a building permit. Surplus materials and construction equipment shall be removed from the premises before occupancy of the completed structure is approved and shall be removed even if the job is abandoned or the permit lapses.
